projects.title: localmicrosites
projects.description: Localmicrosites builds websites for local businesses to enhance SEO, boost engagement, and improve search rankings. It also manages web application deployment to their respective servers.

projects.title: Pop Up Pros
projects.description: Pop Up Pros enables pop-up shop vendors to book events in their area, helping them increase sales and expand their network.

projects.title: Buildovate
projects.description: Buildovate is a CRM for construction companies that streamlines lead management, project tracking, contract handling, financial management, and online payments for a hassle-free experience.

projects.title: Isuzuphil.com.ph
projects.description: Complete revamp of Isuzu Philippines website.

projects.title: Ritemed.com.ph
projects.description: Front-end enhancements of Ritemed Philippines website to provide a better user experience namely a store/medicine locator.

projects.title: Unistar Credit and Finance Corp.
projects.description: Full stack development from scratch. Built a website for a financing firm to provide a fast, easy, and convenient loan operations

projects.title: My Personal Portfolio
projects.description: My Personal Portfolio built with Nuxt and TailwindCSS implementing a mobile-first development. Designed and developed using the latest technologies.

projects.title: BuhayHW.com
projects.description: Designed and developed an IV Therapy website for a client based in United States that provides online scheduling platform for individuals who need IV therapy.

projects.title: Trello Clone
projects.description: Basic Trello app clone using Vue - TS, Vue Composition API, Pinia for state management, and TailwindCSS.

projects.title: Laravel CRM
projects.description: Simple CRM website to showcase TALL (Tailwind, Alpine.js, Laravel, Livewire) stack development using Laravel Filament.
